Nice City and Countryside Tours, Easter day, 20 April 2003

---Distillation stills for perfumes---
---The laboratory where The Nose works- a single person that mixes essense to produce marketable perfume.A new Nose can recognize about 200 scents-an experienced Nose about 1000.---
---The bottling section of the perfumery---

---Lovers arm-in-arm are seen everywhere. Perfume factory is in the background.---
---Next stop is Gourdon, an ancient perched village at 2274 feet altitude.---
---Walls in the distance---

---One view from the first and lowest terrace.---
